TypeTeamMember.biography: Dana is the Vice President of People at TripleLift. She oversees a trusted team that designs best-in-class programs that drive an inclusive and engaging culture to support the evolution of TripleLift. Prior to TripleLift, Dana worked at Unilever where she led HR strategy for Sales, International Business, and eCommerce teams. Dana also worked in the global headquarters in London where she implemented learning and capability strategies across all major markets. After her most recent role working in M&A, she made the switch to ad tech and continues to be a firm believer that people are a companyâ€™s greatest asset.
